about_the_game:
The official OST for Iragon by Repulse.


Includes music from the whole game - Level Music, Fighting Music, Boss Encounters and Ambiences. Dive into the Iragon Original Soundtrack inviting you to go on a journey through tranquil forests, ancient and cursed lands, sand dunes and much more. Get to hear the music detailing the characters emotion in our Camp scenes, where our cast of companions share their inner world and feelings with you. Whether you're exploring the hidden secrets of the world, rallying your allies for you cause or fighting an EPIC boss battle, let the music from Iragon take you in a realm where everything is possible.

Credits:

Composer
  • Hristo Arabadzhiev
Additional Artists
  • Tihomir Rusanov - Vocalist on "Final Offer" OST
  • Alex Shvadchina - Drums and Percussions on " Guild Hall Band" OST
  • Melethiel - Vocalist on "The Calling" ; "Grasspoint Theme" ; "A Knight's Tale" OST

As long as you are not directly reuploading the music with no other content you are free to use the songs in this OST in any videos or streams whether they are monetized or not.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains content that is not appropriate young players and may not be appropriate for viewing at work. It contains Nudity, Sexual Acts, Attempts of Non-consensual Sexual Acts, Mature Language, Unrealistic/Cartoon Violence and Alcohol use.
